revised_title: A New Hygrometer for Measuring Humidity
tldr: The author, M. J. A. de Luc, presents a new hygrometer for measuring humidity, focusing on the extreme humidity produced by water. He explains the importance of a fixed point for measuring humidity and discusses the challenges he faced in developing the hygrometer. The new hygrometer is based on the soaking power of melting ice, providing a simple and effective method for measuring humidity.
